pr_title: Implement BetaApi annotation for hub4j sdk

timeline.message: Add beta api annotation to project

timeline.bodyText: This was a miss from the preview PR caught by the new arch tests
timeline.author: marcoferrer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -78,7 +78,7 @@ public String getName() {
      *
      * @return true if the push to this branch is restricted via branch protection.
      */
-    @Preview
+    @Preview(Previews.LUKE_CAGE)

timeline.bodyText: This was a miss from the preview PR caught by the new arch tests
timeline.author: marcoferrer

timeline.bodyText:
I was unable to find anything in the Github API documentation that confirms this is a preview API.
https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/releases/#list-release-assets
timeline.author: marcoferrer

timeline.bodyText: This predicate ensures that no usages of the preview annotation will accept an empty array for the value param.
timeline.author: marcoferrer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,6 +23,17 @@
             .withImportOption(new ImportOption.DoNotIncludeJars())
             .importPackages("org.kohsuke.github");
 
+    private static final DescribedPredicate<JavaAnnotation<?>> previewAnnotationWithNoMediaType = new DescribedPredicate<JavaAnnotation<?>>(

timeline.bodyText: This method was not labeled properly. The field itself is not part of a preview API. It is only optionally present depending on the source of the data. We've already indicated the potential lack of presence with the @CheckForNull annotation.
timeline.author: marcoferrer
